sources.title: The Three Mesquiteers (1936) WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Syd Saylor
 Director: Ray Taylor

 When a group of war buddies head west to farmstead, they run into trouble!

sources.title: The Three Mesquiteers (1937) Western film Directed by Joseph Kane
sources.description:
A crooked real estate manipulator sells worthless land on mortgage to flood refugees, then tries to profit by reselling the land to the state, committing murder in the process, as the Three Mesquiteers work to bring him and his gang to justice.

metadata.Plot: Lullaby and his World War I buddies head west to farmstead. When the Canfield brothers try to stop them, they get help from Stony and Tucson as Livingstone and Corrigan start their long run as Mesquiteers while Saylor makes his lone appearance.
metadata.Writer: Jack Natteford, Charles R. Condon, William Colt MacDonald
metadata.Actors: Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Syd Saylor
